DOC.brief_summary: The study is conducted in patients with atrial fibrillation undergoing clinically prescribed ablation. The study hypothesis is that ablation at specific sites that are identified to 'drive' the atrial fibrillation may improve the success of the ablation procedure.
DOC.brief_title: The Dynamics of Human Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Subjects will be patients undergoing electrophysiology study and ablation for paroxysmal or persistent atrial fibrillation (AF) after having failed >or= 1 antiarrhythmic drug.
